A clear and concise description of the issue.

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Set environment variables:

   ```bash
   export OUTPUT_FILE="..."
   export DATABASE_URL="..."
   export DATABASE_QUERY="..."
   ```

2. Run the command:

   ```bash
   cargo run --release
   ```

3. See the issue

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.
